thread.title: Chris Brown allegedly threatened to kill Karrueche Tran
thread.title_full: Chris Brown allegedly threatened to kill Karrueche Tran

title: Chris Brown allegedly threatened to kill Karrueche Tran
text:
Chris Brown calls Aziz Ansari 'Aladdin' after Trump comparison 
Troubled pop star Chris Brown has been ordered to stay away from ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran for allegedly threatening to kill her, claiming he was prepared to “take her out.” 
TMZ reports that Tran claimed in a sworn statement to a judge earlier this month that Brown, 27, told a “few people that he was going to kill me” and threatened to shoot her if he couldn’t have her back. 
Brown also threatened to hurt Tran’s friends — recently throwing a drink at one of them — and punched Tran twice in the stomach several years ago, according to the report. 
Tran, who broke up with Brown in 2015 , is now worried that Brown will make good on his threats, prompting her to file for a restraining order against the entertainer. The order requires Brown to stay at least 100 yards away from Tran, her mother and her brother. 
Earlier this month, Brown posted a telling video on Instagram shamelessly revealing his propensity to not let his exes go . 
“Ladies, y’all be complaining about n—as being, like, stalkers and in love with y’all, kinda crazy and s–t and you get tired of them. Well, guess what? I’m one of them n—as! If I love you, bitch, ain’t nobody gonna have you. I’m gonna make you miserable. I’m gonna chase that n—a out. I’m gonna chase your ass around,” he said. 
Brown, who seemingly shot the video poolside, said he just can’t let go. 
“If I love you, bitch, ain’t nobody gonna have you. F–k that!” he added. “I’m tearing up everything.” 
Brown’s reps did not immediately respond to requests for comment. Share this:
